item.description:
SOLD OUT...Have you ever wanted to explore New York City without the hassle of traffic, parking or waiting for subways? Are you curious about the city's historic pizza culture? The Pizza Bus lets you sit back and relax on the city's cheesiest guided tour as your enthusiastic guide tells you everything you ever wanted to know about pizza and pizza culture against the backdrop of the planet's culinary capital.

The tour begins in Little Italy and visits 4 pizzerias. You'll tour Manhattan and at least one outer borough (Brooklyn, the Bronx or Queens) during this 4 1/2 hour exploration of one of New York's most celebrated foods. Beverages are not included.

You have until September 25 to purchase your ticket. After that we cannot guarantee a seat. Please go to this site to purchase your ticket for $60.00: http://www.zerve.com/PizzaTours/NYCBus After your purchase, come back here to respond 'yes, I have purchased' to let us know you will be attending. Many of us will be taking the train to NYC. If you would like to join us, more info will be emailed to you at a later date.

*Because October is National Pizza Month, Scott has some additional activities planned on the bus.

Don't miss a fun time! Rave reviews for this tour!

 

BTW...when you order tickets for Scott's Pizza tour, go here first. http://www.retailmenot.com/view/scottspizzatours.com    click on where it says twittermagic. that copies the code. then when you are on zerve to order ticket, click paste to paste the code. It is a good deal. The total is $56. after they add 2.00 Service charge.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Tour NYC Pizzerias on the Big Yellow Bus with Scott's Pizza Tours.
